summary: REQ-13 appears to be implemented via repository-root README documentation, but the diff summary only explicitly shows modifications to metadata/summaries rather than an actual file add; there are also unrelated metadata/state updates not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added metadata entry describing a comprehensive root README and many frontend files via `frontend-file-summaries.txt`, despite the BuildRequest only requesting creation of a top-level `README.md`.
hallucinated_features.reason: The only requested change is to create/update the root README; updating a file-summary inventory is not mentioned as part of the request or constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified `project_state.json` (including a summary referencing a different tech stack: HTML/CSS/Bootstrap + Flask + SQLite).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is solely about adding/updating the root `README.md`; changing project state/summary (and to a seemingly unrelated stack) is not requested.
